meet_king.title: The Throne of Hellstrom
meet_king.text:
The throne room is vast and magnificent, with black marble pillars reaching 
to a constellation-painted ceiling. Upon a throne of obsidian and silver sits 
King Hellstrom himself.

He's younger than expected - a king with kind eyes bearing terrible worry. 
As you approach with the glowing stone, he rises.

"So, the prophecy is fulfilled," he says, his voice echoing in the chamber. 
"Young Rory, Stone-Bearer from beyond the veil, welcome to our realm."

He descends to stand before you.

"I will not lie - our kingdom faces its darkest hour. The Shadow grows stronger 
each day. But if you can save us, I promise riches beyond measure and fame 
that will echo through the ages."

choices.text: Accept the quest to defeat the Shadow

accept_quest.title: The Hero's Preparation
accept_quest.text:
"Your courage honors us all," King Hellstrom says with relief. "But you 
cannot face the Shadow unprepared. Our royal armory contains weapons blessed 
by ancient mages - choose one that calls to your spirit."
